name: K.O.VID
description:
This is a 3D game made in two weeks as an end-of-term project. The creators are Diana Nascimento and I, Saray Leal.

In it you are a fumigator who must disinfect the city due to the invasion of the coronavirus.

But do not worry, you will be well protected and prepared to fulfill your mission. Hurry up, plug in your hose and kill them all.

We hope you like it. You can leave any criticism in the comments. We will be delighted to hear from you!
